titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Select Committee on Intelligence.
An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Select Committee on Intelligence.

action.text: Select Committee on Intelligence. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Feinstein. Without written report.

reference.label: text of measure as reported in Senate

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Select Committee on Intelligence from March 1, 2013, through September 30, 2013.
